  • Class
    Description
    ChooseAssistantController
    ChooseAssistantController class is a controller, it is used to visually display Assistant cards and to handle the choice of one of them
    ChooseColorController
    ChooseColorController class is a controller, it is used to display students of five different colors and to handle the choice of the desired color
    CONTROLLERS
    Enum CONTROLLERS enumerates all the possible scene with the corresponding path, width and height.
    GameController
    GameController class handles the main Game scene
    GUIController
    Interface GUIController contains the method setGui that is common to all the controllers.

    LoseController
    Class LoseController handles the FXML scene that appears when the player loses
    SetUpController
    This class is the GUIController which handles choosing which host IP and port to connect to.
    WinController
    Class WinController handles the FXML scene that appears when the player wins
